SEARCH
Package hu.bme.mit.theta.solver

Interface SolverFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
BitwuzlaSmtLibSolverFactory, BoolectorSmtLibSolverFactory, CVC4SmtLibSolverFactory, CVC5SmtLibSolverFactory, EldaricaSmtLibSolverFactory, GenericSmtLibSolverFactory, GolemSmtLibSolverFactory, JavaSMTSolverFactory, MathSATSmtLibSolverFactory, PrincessSmtLibSolverFactory, SMTInterpolSmtLibSolverFactory, SolverValidatorWrapperFactory, Z3LegacySolverFactory, Z3SmtLibSolverFactory, Z3SolverFactory
public interface SolverFactory
Interface for solver factories that can instantiate solvers. Stores a configuration of a solver, and creates instances with that configuration.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default HornSolver
    createHornSolver()
    Create a solver that is capable of horn solving (CHC).
    ItpSolver
    createItpSolver()
    Create a solver that is capable of interpolation.
    Solver
    createSolver()
    Create a basic solver instance.
    UCSolver
    createUCSolver()
    Create a solver that is capable of producing unsat cores.
